Member Function Documentation

void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateLog2Ratios ( bool  adjustYTarget = true  )  [protected]

Calculate the log2 ratios.

The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment. Note that the signal is A + B.

Parameters:
int - The col index.
int - The experiment index.

void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::GCCorrection ( CNExperiment *  pobjExperiment  )  [protected]

Apply the GC content correction.

This is used to reduce wavyness in the smoothed log2 ratios. The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.

int - The col index.
